parameters.definition: The time taken to make one unit of spare part k on machine s
Profit from producing one unit of spare part k
Capacity of machine s for the month

description: Formulate the problem of determining the quantities of each spare part to be made during the month so as to maximize \param{Profit}. Each spare part k requires \param{Time} on machine s, and each machine s has a maximum monthly capacity of \param{Capacity}.
